pages.text: Yawunik was a Cambrian arthropod from the Burgess shale with large frontal appendages that looked like giant claws relative to the body. It was named after a primordial sea monster in Ktunaxa mythology.
$(l)Eats:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Drops Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Bucket
